titleStmt.title: A true relation of every remarkable circumstance in relieving of Tredagh, by Captaine Thomas Steutevile. Also the copy of Sir Phelome Oneal's commission, for the establishing of Colonell Richard Plunket Lievetenant [sic] Generall of Lempster, and Vlster. Together, with the distresse of the whole kingdome, and other passages of note.
titleStmt.author: Stuteville, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. R. for C. M.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
